generator: 1 { topicOf(W, T) : topic(T) } 1 :- workshop(W). 1 { scheduled(W, R, S, D) : room(R), slot(S), day(D) } 1 :- workshop(W).

hard_constraints.description: Quick sanity check to make sure two workshops don't try to squeeze into the same room at the same time.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W1, R, S, D), scheduled(W2, R, S, D), W1 != W2.

hard_constraints.description: Cap it at two workshops per room each day so things don't get too crowded.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- room(R), day(D), #count { W, S : scheduled(W, R, S, D) } > 2.

hard_constraints.description: Stay away from room 2 in the afternoon, it is totally off-limits.
AI folks are strictly morning people, so no midday or afternoon sessions for them.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- topicOf(W, "AI"), scheduled(W, R, S, D), S != "morning".

hard_constraints.description: Math workshops are solo acts; keep them from overlapping at the same time even in different rooms.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- topicOf(W1, "Math"), topicOf(W2, "Math"), W1 < W2, scheduled(W1, R1, S, D), scheduled(W2, R2, S, D).

hard_constraints.description: Don't put AI and Bio in the same room on the same day; they need their space.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- topicOf(W1, "AI"), topicOf(W2, "Bio"), scheduled(W1, R, S1, D), scheduled(W2, R, S2, D).

hard_constraints.description: Every day needs to have at least one session of AI, Math, and Bio to keep things balanced.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- day(D), topic(T), #count { W : topicOf(W, T), scheduled(W, R, S, D) } == 0.

soft_constraints.description: Try to keep the rooms busy and minimize those empty time slots.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("idle_slot", (R, S, D), 1) :- room(R), slot(S), day(D), not scheduled(_, R, S, D).

global_objective: #minimize { Cost, Name, Tuple : penalty(Name, Tuple, Cost) }.
